constraints.name: adjacent_swap
constraints.description: 每次只能交换相邻节点（有公共边或公共顶点）中的元素
constraints.formal: swap(u, v) if and only if u and v are adjacent

constraints.name: node_exchange_limit
constraints.description: 每个节点参与交换的次数不超过给定上限

constraints.name: target_state_reachability
constraints.description: 必须通过有限次交换达到目标状态，否则无解
constraints.formal: if target_state is not reachable, return -1
